title: place.calendarType
description:
Determines how long the [place](../place.json) exists.

Possible values: `periodic`, `permanent`.

## periodic

For places that only exist for a specific period.

**Must** be combined with [startDate](./startDate.json) and [endDate](./endDate.json).

Can be combined with [openingHours](./openingHours.json).

## permanent

For places that exist permanently.

Can be combined with [openingHours](./openingHours.json).
